occupation: Data Analyst at IOM - UN Migration
headline: Data Analyst at Missing Migrants Project , IOM - UN Migration
summary: MIGRATION REVOLUTIONIST - I believe in the potential of every individual to bring value to societies. I work to inform evidence-based and humane migration policies. I specialize on the risks that people face on irregular migration routes around the world. I have worked and studied worked and studied in Mexico, Belgium, India, Kenya and Germany. I am the most comfortable working in multicultural teams.

experiences.title: Data Analyst
experiences.description:
Data collection, management and dissemination for the Missing Migrants Project, hosted by IOM's Global Migration Data Analysis Center. 

Data used to inform target 10.7.3 of the SDGs, "number of people who died or disappeared in the process of migration towards an international destination."

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.description: Intern of the Missing Migrants Project at the Global Migration Data Center (GMDAC).

experiences.company: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH
experiences.title: Junior Program Officer
experiences.description:
EU Trust Fund for Africa, Better Migration Management Programme. 

Successfully switched between three regional offices holding different positions and performing corresponding tasks in each of them.
experiences.location: Brussels, Belgium / Nairobi, Kenya / Berlin, Germany
